changelog.description: Stay updated with our latest features, improvements, bug fixes, and security updates

items: Added dedicated Backstory Generator page with full internationalization support for character backstories
Launched Poem Title Generator with its own landing page, hero module, and AI Tools hub integration
Added Story Prompt Generator page to create creative prompts and connect into story, backstory, and fantasy tools
Added a one-click "Back to component" button that appears in the bottom-right corner after you scroll past the generation area
Fixed production build failure in the story generator caused by a stale breadcrumb import referencing a non-existent file
Added unified keyboard shortcut support to all main generators (Story, Plot, Poem, Fanfic, Tabbed Fanfic, Book Title) including Generate (⌘⏎ / Ctrl⏎) and Focus Input (⌘F / CtrlF)
Introduced a reusable GeneratorShortcutHints component to display available shortcuts consistently below the primary generate buttons

Enabled auto-save draft support for the main input fields across all core generators (Story, Plot, Poem, Fanfic, Tabbed Fanfic, Book Title), persisting drafts to localStorage per locale and restoring them automatically after refresh or navigation
Refined generator button labels to keep them clean while surfacing keyboard shortcuts in a dedicated hint area for better discoverability
Added save story support for the poem generator, including post-generation guidance and the Story Save dialog
Added source category filter tags to the Story Square community page so users can browse stories by origin (story, fanfic, plot, poem)
Added Story Square community page to showcase publicly shared AI-generated stories
Added My Stories dashboard in the user console to manage saved stories in one place
Added Creation Overview dashboard to visualize your total stories, words written, active days, and streaks
Refined the plot generator save guidance layout so Save Story content appears on its own row and feels less visually crowded
Enhanced Story Square filters with full multi-language label support across all supported interface languages
